desc: The Heart & Compass makes the transition towards a zero waste and environmentally-conscious lifestyle enjoyable. Buy incredible products without single-use plastic that are safe and gentle for you and the planet.

layout.text:
DELIVERING TO RG21 TO RG29 POSTCODES
VISIT THE SHOP LOCATED OPPOSITE THE VIABLES COMMUNITY CENTRE IN BASINGSTOKE

OPENING HOURS ARE:
THURSDAY 11AM TO 2PM
FRIDAY 11AM TO 2PM
SATURDAY 11AM TO 4PM
